subsection.name: Use external sequence filters
subsection.p: Teolenn is a very customizable tool, you can use your own sequence filter. This filter must be written in Java and implements the SequenceFilter interface. See the developer section for more information. Your plugin must be in the classpath of Toelenn define in teolenn.sh. In addition, to use your filter in Toelenn, you must add the full name of the main class (witch implements SequenceFilter) of your plugin in the design file :
